Reviews.Title: Samsung T349 Review
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung t349 phone on the 7th and it arrived on the 17th. The look and feel of the phone was better than I expected. The settings are pretty basic but OK. I am travelling in the US and ordered this phone because my HTC desire phone I brought with me from overseas had problems. The Samsung t349 was supposed to be unlocked but tried two sim cards from two different carries and both failed. For one sim card it said 'wrong card' and the other it said 'sim crash'. I am very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: It was locked
Reviews.Author: Alexander Campos Monge
Reviews.Content: This phone is not unlocked!! At least the one that I got wasn't! Bad Deal! I had to pay to some else for the unlock! Do not buy this!

Reviews.Title: locked to t-mobile like my previous phone order
Reviews.Author: JSB
Reviews.Content: Hi I usually dont write reviews but this review is for all prospective buyers, this phone is locked to T-mobile, It does not work with any other network. i bought it as a backup phone to use a different simcard paid $60+ for phone as it said unlocked.it is useless for me now. better get a t-mobile no-contract phone if you want a backup phone else it is just useless.T-mobile will not help you unlock the phone.I bought many things from amazon but this is useless.

Reviews.Title: No battery with Samsung T349 unlocked phone.
Reviews.Author: JeriLe
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung T349 Unlocked phone.  I received the phone but it did not have a battery.  I contacted OEM several times and they said they are looking into it.  They still have not notified me that they are sending the battery.  I can send the phone back, but I do not know if they will give me a refund of $45. I WOULD NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Good feature phone.
Reviews.Author: NT "NT"
Reviews.Content: Very simple to use but the buttons are too hard to the touch and slippery.  The power is short and there is no after market extended battery.  I still have it, although now i have a Samsung Galaxy S4 and a Galaxy Note 3 in  December 2013.  I mostly used Samsung phone, i had Nokia and Sony Ericsson before.  I like the T349 and T369 if you want a feature phone.

Reviews.Title: Simple phone
Reviews.Author: Diane Lash Ferber
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need it too and takes decent pictures too...at a good price.  Only thing missing is a car charger.

Reviews.Title: disappointing phone and vendor
Reviews.Author: kmakron
Reviews.Content: The phone will not power up after six months of use.  Contacted Samsung, and they said the phone was out of warranty.  Contacted seller, and they said they only offer 90 days to return or exchange.  Overall, a very disappointing experience.  Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Samsung T349 Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: The Samsung T349 is a good phone, crisp sound and easy to use. The camera and video recorder produces clear vibrant images.  This is the second one of this model i purchased in a month. This item will make a great gift. It ships free under the super saver shipping.Diane

ProductInfo.Features:
Innovative 20-key partial QWERTY keyboard combined with XT9 predictive text entry for easy composing of email and text/instant messages
1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD memory expansion to 4 GB; personal organizer tools; MP3 player
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T349 Unlocked Phone with 1.3MP Camera, Video Capture, and Speakerphone - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Silver/Lime
